results.title: Exposed Path Found: /robots.txt
results.description: An accessible path was discovered at https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/robots.txt, which returned a status code of 200. This could expose sensitive files, directory listings, or functionality.
results.remediation: Ensure that sensitive files and directories are not publicly accessible. Configure your web server to show a 404 Not Found error instead of a 403 Forbidden error for non-existent resources to avoid path enumeration. Restrict access to authorized users where necessary.
results.impact: Information disclosure, potential for further attacks.

results.title: Insecure Deserialization
results.description: Potential insecure deserialization vulnerability detected. The application appears to be processing serialized data without proper validation.
results.category: A08:2021 - Software and Data Integrity Failures

results.title: XML External Entity (XXE) Vulnerability
results.description: Found potential XXE vulnerability. The application appears to be processing external entities in XML input.
results.evidence:
{
  "url": "https://www.rexcybersolutions.com/",
  "content_type": "application/xml",
  "payload": "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
            <!DOCTYPE foo [
            <!ELEMENT foo ANY >
            <!ENTITY xxe SYSTEM "file:///etc/passwd" >]>
            <foo>&xxe;</foo>",
  "indicator": "DOCTYPE",
